title: jyOtisvarUpiNi
sahitya:
jytOtisvarUpiNi ambA shuddha hrdaya ramaNI jaya


anupallavi

  Adi shakti akhilEshvari Anandamaya jnAnak-kozhundE


caraNam    vanjaminri lanjaminri panjaminrip-pApaminri
anjudalinri ArudalAgi aruLum poruLum arivum aramum
anbum amudum aLavaLAvi avani vAzhvu navam pera aruL
